mapper.select: insert into eval_list(eval_id, eval_type, eval_name, year, branch, eval_report_start, eval_report_end, eval_start_date, eval_end_date, eval_status) values(#{eval_id}, #{eval_type}, #{eval_name}, #{year}, #{branch}, #{eval_report_start}, #{eval_report_end}, #{eval_start_date}, #{eval_end_date}, '평가준비')
select eval_id from eval_list where eval_id = #{eval_id}
select eval_id from eval_list order by eval_id desc limit 1
select * from eval_list order by year desc, branch desc
select * from eval_list where year=#{year} and branch=#{branch} and eval_type=#{eval_type}
delete from eval_list where eval_id=#{eval_id}
select * from eval_list where eval_status = '성과보고'
select * from eval_list where eval_id = #{eval_id}
insert into eval_his_list(eval_id, emp_id, content, eval_his_status) values(#{eval_id}, #{emp_id}, #{content}, '작성완료' )
select * from eval_his_list where eval_id = #{eval_id} and emp_id = #{emp_id}
select * from eval_his_list where emp_id = #{emp_id} and eval_his_status not in ('작성완료')
select emp_dnum, emp_id, emp_name, emp_position from employee where emp_id = #{emp_id} and approval = 0

select h.emp_id, emp_name,emp_position, eval_his_id, h.eval_id, year, branch, eval_type, eval_name, eval_start_date, eval_end_date, eval_his_status from eval_his_list h, eval_list l, employee e where h.eval_id = l.eval_id and h.emp_id = e.emp_id and eval_status = '평가시작' and emp_dnum = #{emp_dnum} and emp_position in ('팀장','과장','대리','사원') and approval = 0

select h.emp_id, emp_name, emp_position, eval_his_id, h.eval_id, year, branch, eval_type, eval_name, eval_start_date, eval_end_date, eval_his_status, content, score_perform, score_attendance, score_develop, score_total, eval_grade, eval_comment from eval_his_list h, eval_list l, employee e where h.eval_id = l.eval_id and h.emp_id = e.emp_id and eval_his_id = #{eval_his_id} and approval = 0

update eval_his_list set evaluator=#{evaluator}, score_perform=#{score_perform}, score_attendance=#{score_attendance}, score_develop=#{score_develop}, score_total=#{score_total}, eval_grade=#{eval_grade}, eval_comment=#{eval_comment}, eval_his_status = '평가완료' where eval_his_id = #{eval_his_id}

select eval_his_id, h.eval_id, year, branch, eval_type, eval_name, score_total, eval_grade from eval_his_list h, eval_list l where h.eval_id = l.eval_id and emp_id = #{emp_id} and eval_his_status = '평가종료' order by year desc, branch desc
